metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8879 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Dolibarr ERP/CRM 4.0.4 allows password changes without supplying the current password, which makes it easier for physically proximate attackers to obtain access via an unattended workstation.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
